call_title: Rosen Bridge Update | Joseph Armeano & tmr.erg | Ergoversary 2025

commitments.quote: We'll probably see that live. I don't know. I say two weeks just because we always need end-to-end tests and everything.

commitments.commitment: Wallet SDK integration will be a big development
commitments.quote: I do think in terms of the front-facing aspect of Rosen, that's going to be a big development in 2025.

commitments.commitment: Create thresholds on top of Monero and relist Monero on different exchange environments
commitments.quote: one of my personal goals just for I don't know, funsies, let's call it, is going to be to create thresholds on top of Monero and relist Monero on different exchange environments.

key_facts.fact: There are a couple hundred watchers participating in Rosen
key_facts.speaker: Armeanio

key_facts.fact: Over 40 different tokens can be sent across Ergo, Cardano, Ethereum, and Binance
key_facts.speaker: tmr.erg

key_facts.fact: 3 million ERG are currently on the bridge
key_facts.speaker: tmr.erg

key_facts.fact: Rosen is one of the largest exchanges in simple terms
key_facts.speaker: Armeanio

key_facts.fact: Someone paid $10 million for listing on a Korean exchange
key_facts.speaker: Armeanio

key_facts.fact: Storage boxes live on Ergo for about four years and pay miners twice
key_facts.speaker: Armeanio
